issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: HiveServer2: SessionState has a static sync block around an AtomicBoolean

comments.body:
i think AtomicBoolean is enough, checked patch history of HIVE-19813, first synchronized was moved from method signature to isStarted checker block, and then AtomicBoolean was added, however the latter seems to be enough in this case
attached test case

[~gopalv] [~kgyrtkirk] could you take a look?
I removed the "unrelated" unit test in 02.patch, it was just a "POC"
